id.description: Unique identifier for the call data record.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the call record was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the call record was last updated.

to.description: Phone number or contact that received the call.

from.description: Phone number or contact from which the call originated.

duration.description: Duration of the call in seconds.

direction.description: Direction of the call (e.g., incoming, outgoing).

status.description: Status of the call (e.g., completed, missed).

call_type.description: Type of the call (e.g., inbound, outbound).

recording.description: Information related to the call recording.

url.description: URL to access the call recording.

status.description: Status of the recording (e.g., available, unavailable).

recording_status.description: Status of the call recording (e.g., recording started, recording finished).

user.description: Information related to the user who made/received the call.

called_person.description: Information about the person who was called.

id.description: Unique identifier for the called person.

_href.description: Link to the called person's details.
